markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Brine Shark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2989)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Brine sharks are deadly elementals that roam the endless oceans of the [Plane of Water](/Planes.aspx?ID=32). They often slip into mortal oceans as well, competing with natural predators or even joining schools of flesh and blood sharks.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Brine_Shark.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Brine Shark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2989)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=533" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 148 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, swim 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d12+7 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Deep Plunge** <actions string="Single Action" />  The brine shark dives into the water, [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381) twice straight down. If it's [grabbing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restraining](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) a creature, it brings that creature along with it.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-412" />
name: Brine Shark
